content: meet sheldon the sheep this super little guy sits 15cms tall when completed to make your own sheldon you will need * size 6 0mm us j crochet hook * safety eyes * tapestry needle * stuffing * chunky weight yarn in cream 150g * chunky weight yarn in grey 50g * chunky weight yarn in black 50g sheldon is crocheted in uk terms and the abbreviations include double_crochet = double_crochet decrease = double_crochet 2 stitches together decrease lpst = loop stitch lp2tog = loop stitch 2 stitches together loop decrease for more information and a tutorial on the loop stitch see www curlygirlcoop blogspot co uk
